author: radekkapka
content: would you expect to still be subscribed at epoch `until_epoch` or not?

author: radekkapka
content: if it's inclusive, then maybe it would be better to rename it to `up_to_epoch` (sounds less ambiguous)

author: radekkapka
content: unless the spec is frozen; in that case let's just add documentation no matter which way it is

author: jgm
content: `until_epoch` sounds exclusive, but I think that it's inclusive (_i.e._ it should be the first epoch of the next sync committee period in usual operation).  But it really depends on how the client teams have coded it, so will be interesting to hear their take on it.

author: radekkapka
content: We implemented it as exclusive in Prysm. My personal opinion is that this should be documented in the spec and all teams should follow what the spec says, because the field name is ambiguous.
